overview: Vixen is proud to present its premiere installment of Sirens. This series leads you to the most alluring beauties you'll ever encounter. Featured cover girl Allie Nicole is the lifeguard of your wettest dreams. When the summer gets slow, this blonde beach bunny makes waves with a bad boy who wont respect the rules. Nancy Ace, Little Caprice, and Freya Mayer are all here bringing sexual fantasies to life.
title: Sirens
